reuters.title: GREAT ATLANTIC <GAP> WITHDRAWS DECHAMPS BID
reuters.body: The Great Atlantic and Pacific Tea Co Inc said it withdrew its offer to acquire Delchamps Inc <DLCH.O> for 27 dlrs a share or about 175 mln dlrs, which was made earlier this month. Michael Rourke, A and P vice president, said the company withdrew the offer because Delchamps did not respond favorably to it and because of market conditions. He would not comment on whether A and P would make another offer to acquire Delchamps. Reuter 
